Package Details:

  • 4G Data-only E-SIM.
  • Operates on the True Move H Universal Communication 
  • Internet connectivity required for eSIM activation.
  • Activation: Begins upon connecting to network in supported countries
  • Compatibility: Supports Android and iOS devices (refer to FAQ for compatible handsets)
  • Customer Support: 24/7 business and customer support service

Usage Restrictions:

  • Supports only in mentioned destination

Supported destination:

  • Canada

APN:
